description.en:
Kang Hyunmoo is a dirt-poor man whose dreams of becoming a hunter were torn apart.

But one day, while he was dreaming of getting rich quick, something appeared in front of him… [Difficulty: Hell. You are entering the Star of Apocalypse.] “…What?” He’ll now be monopolizing items and skills in a future Earth overrun with monsters!
description.ko:
헌터를 꿈꿔볼 가능성도 짓밟힌 흙수저 채취꾼 강현무.
어느 날 일확천금을 꿈꾸며 잠든 그의 앞에 나타난 것은……?!
【난이도: 지옥 종말의 별에 진입합니다.】
“……뭐?”
괴물들로 넘쳐나는 미래의 지구에서 아이템도,
스킬도 나 혼자 독식한다!

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.es-la: La bebé prisionera del castillo de invierno

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: モノクロラバーズ

description.en:
One day, suddenly, an angel came descending from the sky!?  
While heading towards his university entrance ceremony, Yuu meets an unsociable, mysterious girl. Yuu, who can't help but be curious of her — who is as free-willing as a stray cat — gradually shortens the distance between them. As various feelings mix around, their bond gets spun together, but what can be seen beyond that is…

altTitles.ja: レ・セルバン

description.en: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.
description.ru:
Когда очнулась Арсиноя, принцесса страны у подножия горы под названием Хелленталь, с вторжения Илийской империи прошёл уже месяц. В тот день была убита её мать, пробудился злой дракон, а родная земля обратилась в пепел. С помощью «безумицы, поглощающей память» Арсиноя смогла сдержать дракона, но взамен лишилась всех воспоминаний об отце. А теперь на её пути появляется человек по имени Серван и называется её отцом…
Правитель погибшей страны и принцесса, потерявшая память. Сплочённые утратой, вдвоём они отправляются в путешествие ради возрождения былых себя.
description.pt-br: Uma jovem princesa do país montanhoso de Helentar, Arsinoe, acorda e descobre que um mês se passou desde o dia em que o Império de Ilia invadiu. Naquele dia, sua mãe foi morta, um dragão maligno despertou e sua terra natal foi arrasada pelo fogo. Com o poder de Sent Fuana, "Louca que devora memórias", ela é capaz de manter o dragão à distância, mas em troca perde as memórias de seu pai. Agora, um homem que afirma ser seu pai, Cervin, aparece diante dela. Um rei sem pátria e uma princesa sem memória. Duas pessoas reunidas pela perda partem em uma jornada de recuperação.

description.en:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño pequeño apareció ante mí. “¿Sabes dónde está la academia? ¡Tengo que ir ahí! “ “Has estado yendo en la dirección equivocada todo este tiempo. “ ” !!! “ “¿Qué está mirando, señor?” Supongo que esta es mi hija. "¿Quieres uno?" Pero no creo que ella sepa que soy su padre... Probablemente estés pensando eso, ¿verdad? ¡Si crees eso, estás equivocado, papá! Mi nombre es Calypso, un regresor cuatro veces. Mi vida se arruinó cuando poseí un personaje de novela. ¡Incluso tuve un hijo! ¡El tercer episodio de mi vida fue un final de masacre! '¡Ustedes XX chicos que están locos por esta protagonista femenina!' Sin embargo, por alguna razón, no importa lo que haga, no puedo pasar de mi cumpleaños número 22 y regresar a mi mundo. 
Sin embargo, accidentalmente encontré una manera en la tercera partida cuando el dragón se salió de control y murió. Cuando el dragón corre desenfrenado, ¡la dimensión se distorsiona! ¿Puedo volver a la casa en la que viví durante eso? La cuarta vez, cuando regresé nuevamente, decidí usar este dragón. ¿Abby? ¿Hermanos mayores? ¡Todo es solo un trampolín para encontrarte con el dragón! "¡Espera, dragón!" [Quiero morir ahora, pero me estoy volviendo loco con todos estos retornos repetidos.] [Mi familia está ligada a la familia real] [¿Alguien ha oído hablar alguna vez de los débiles?/ Sólo los más fuertes son felices]

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

altTitles.ja: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

description.en: A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

altTitles.ja: 私が娘ですか？

description.en:
She was adopted by the devil-like count. Before dying, Hailynn lived her whole life being confined in a hut. When she opened her eyes she was 8 years old. She returned back in time right before she was to be adopted by the count.  
  
Hailynn wanted to ask God… What was it that she had done wrong?!?!  
  
She cursed God and threw herself out of the carriage that was en route to the count's estate. On that path, she met the Duke Kalisto, the representation of the sacred Vincent Kalisto.  
  
But… "She is of noble blood."  
  
She thought she was an orphan but in actuality, she is actually the first daughter, in a thousand years, of the ducal household of Kalisto.  
  
"Am I really… the daughter?"  
  
However, Vincent has never approved of any woman and lived his life in abstinence. He swore he did not commit any act that may produce a child, thus he denies that he's the father…  
  
"…A monster?"  
  
What is the secret behind Hailynn's birth and the abrupt movement from the empire and the holy country?!  
  
This is the first-time father, Vincent, and first-time daughter, Hailynn's clumsy yet lovely story.  
  


---

**Links:**  
* [Official Video Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=96anSvKr0g4)  
  


---
description.ko:
악마 같은 백작에게 입양되어
평생 오두막에 감금된 채 살다 죽음을 맞이한 헤이린.

눈을 뜨니 일곱 살,
하필이면 백작에게 입양되기 직전 상황으로 회귀했다.

헤이린은 신에게 묻고 싶었다.
도대체 자신이 무얼 잘못했느냐고!

그녀는 신을 원망하며 백작가를 향해 달리는 마차 밖으로 몸을 내던지고
그 길로 신의 축복을 받은 칼리스토 가문의 공작이자
신성함의 상징 빈센트를 만나게 된다.

그런데
“푸른 피입니다.”

고아인 줄 알았던 그녀가 칼리스토 공작가에서
천 년 만에 태어난 여자아이란다.

“정말 내가…… 딸이에요?”

일평생 여자를 멀리하며 금욕적인 삶을 살아온
빈센트는 결코 애가 생길 만한 행동(?)은 한 적이 없다며
아빠임을 부정하는데...

“……마물인가?”

출생의 비밀을 품은 헤이린의 등장으로
제국과 신성국이 크게 들썩인다!

초보 아빠 빈센트와 초보 딸 헤이린의
서투르지만 사랑스러운 육아물!
description.ru:
Хелен, удочерённая графом Дэймо́ном, всю свою жизнь провела взаперти, вплоть до своей смерти. Но когда она открыла глаза, Хелен снова стала 7-милетним ребёнком, а сам граф её ещё не удочерил.   
  
Хелен всегда спрашивала бога, в чём заключалась её вина за такую ужасную жизнь. "Что я сделала не так?..". Обвиняя бога, она убегает от свой судьбы, пока не встречает Винсента, герцога семьи Каллиста, который был благословлён богом и считался святым.   
  
Но…   
  
- Ты голубых кровей.   
  
Она была сиротой, а также ребёнком, рождённым в доме Каллисто много лет тому назад.   
  
- Ты правда… моя дочь?   
  
Винсент, что сохранял спокойную жизнь вдали от женщин, отрицал факт того, что он ее отец.   
  
-… Разве это плохо?   
  
С появлением Хелен и тайной ее рождения вся империя покачнулась.  


---
description.tr:
Şeytan gibi bir kont tarafından evlat edinildi. Ölmeden önce, Hailynn tüm hayatını bir kulübede hapsedilerek yaşadı. Gözlerini açtığında 8 yaşındaydı. Kont tarafından evlat edinilmeden hemen önce zamanda geçmişe gitti.  
  
Hailynn Tanrı’ya sormak istedi… Yanlış yaptığı şey neydi?!?!  
  
Tanrı’yı lanetledi ve kontun malikanesine giden arabadan atladı. Bu yolda, Kutsal Vincent Kalisto’nun temsili olan Dük Kalisto ile tanıştı.  
  
Ancak… “Asil kan olduğunu söyledi.”  
  
Bir yetim olduğunu düşündüm ama aslında, o aslında ilk kızı, bin yıl içinde, Kalisto Dükalığından.  
  
“Gerçekten ben… kızı mıyım?”  
  
Bununla birlikte, Vincent hiçbir zaman herhangi bir kadını onaylamadı ve hayatını yoksunluk içinde yaşadı. Bir çocuk doğurabilecek herhangi bir eylemde bulunmadığına yemin etti, bu yüzden baba olduğunu reddetti…  
  
“…Bir canavar mı?”

title.en: Lord Baby Runs a Romance Fantasy With Cash

altTitles.en: Miss Baby Runs a Fantasy Romance With Cash

altTitles.uk: Лорд дитина запускає романтичну фантазію готівкою

altTitles.id: Bayibro Menjalankan Romansa Fantasi dengan Cash

altTitles.zh: 宝贝用罗盘玩转罗曼史

altTitles.en: Surviving A Ro-Fan Baby With Coin

altTitles.es-la: La Bebé Lleva Una Fantasía Romántica Con Dinero

description.en:
I lived without a home or family and suffered until I died, but then an 'angel' appeared and made me an offer.

"You, a professional reader of rofan novels, would you like to be reincarnated into a world created based on rofan?"

Because he said that my (handsome) Dad and my (handsome) older brothers will fed me with a diamond spoon, I was reborn...

—They say I might be a child born from my mother's affair?

As soon as I was born, I was handed over to my relatives and became a servant, facing abuse.

"At this rate, I might freeze to death or starve to death alone."

There's nothing I can do about this situation.

"Daddy, take me away—!"

Let's find a way to survive somehow.
But...

[You have fulfilled the conditions.]
[The trait <Rush and Cash> has awakened.]

[Dear reader, do not hesitate to use any means and methods to obtain what you desire. Conquer and seize it!
Romance novel readers don't back down in situations like this!
Show your abilities!
-Condition: Persuade the Duke of Pheraton and obtain the <Summoning Medium>.
-Reward: 5,000 cash draw ticket.
-Quest rejection penalty: Game over in life.
-Quest failure penalty: Game over in life.]

"So, the quest is to kiss my Dad on the cheek?"

...I've been scammed.
description.es-la: Viví sufriendo sin hogar, sin religión, sin padres, pero apareció un ángel y me reencarnó. “Tú, una profesional en lo que respecta a las novelas de fantasía romántica, ¿te gustaría reencarnar en un mundo creado a partir de una novela de fantasía romántica?” Reencarné porque dijo que tendría un padre (guapo) y un hermano mayor (guapo) que me daría de comer con una cuchara e incluso me regalaría una mina de diamantes, pero... -¿Podría ser una niña de la aventura de mi madre? Tan pronto como nací, me enviaron a la casa de mi madre y caí en una familia que me priva. "¡Si me quedo así, podría terminar congelándome o muriéndome de hambre!"

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

altTitles.ja: Kisu Shite Kurenakya Shinjau

altTitles.en: Your Kiss is the Only Medicine

altTitles.ja: キスしてくれなきゃ死んじゃう

description.en: Yuuta Sato accidentally discovers that childhood friend Rinko Uenohara contracted a very rare illness called the "Kissing Disease". The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?

title.en: Ochikobore Kenja wa UR Skill Keishousha de Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ賢者はURスキル継承者で成り上がる

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochikobore Kenja wa UR Skill Keishou-sha de Nariagaru

altTitles.en: The Fallen Sage Rises to Power with the UR Inheritor Skill

description.en:
In a world where dungeons connected to another world have appeared, people who awaken to mysterious powers and defeat monsters for a living are called adventurers. 

Yuto Kirishima draws the jackpot job of Sage, but for some reason, his magic power is zero! He is looked down upon as the weakest Sage who can't attack. Ultimately, he is abandoned by his companions and used as a sacrifice. Just then, a mysterious choice appears before him. 

"Do you want to perform this action?"

When he answers, his abilities awaken and the UR skill [Inheritor] activates. This skill allows him to use the techniques of past sages! 

With the strongest skill in hand, the story of his struggle to rise as the strongest adventurer begins!

altTitles.ja: 銀のくつ

description.en: This is the story of Jun, a (nearly) six-year-old boy. Life from the point of view of a little rascal with two loving dads and a pair of adorable friends.

altTitles.th: พวกเราจะเป็นครอบครัวเดียวกันได้ไหมนะ?

altTitles.ja: 家族ごっこはもうやめます

altTitles.vi: Chúng ta có thể trở thành một gia đình được không?

description.ar:
تم تبنيي “نافييا أغنييس” للللزواج من ولليي اللعهد نييابة عن ابنة دوق أغنييس اللمرييضة. “أرييد أن أكون عائللة حقييقيية.” نافييا ، اللتيي كانت معللقة عللى عاطفة عائللتها ، تبذلل قصارى جهدها للتصبح إمبراطورة أثناء تعرضها للسوء اللمعامللة ، وللكن فيي اللللحظة اللتيي ييتم فييها عللاج فييفييان ، ابنة اللدوق اللبييوللوجيية ، تخللت عائللتها عنها. للا ، سييكون من اللعدلل أن نقولل إنهم تخللوا عنها فيي كلل مرة. “كم من اللوقت ييجب أن أجرب؟ أن تكون عائللتك “. خللعت نافييا قفازاتها اللمللطخة باللدماء. ثم عللى معصمها اللأييمن ، تم اللكشف عن رقم غيير مرئيي للم ييكن مرئييًا للللآخريين. 1 باللنظر إللى اللأرقام ، اعترفت بهدوء. “اللآن ، سأتوقف عن اللللعب باللأللعاب اللعائلليية.” فيي تللك اللللحظة ، تغيير اللرقم عللى اللمعصم. 0 هكذا بدأت اللحيياة من جدييد. “إذا للمستنيي ، عللييك أن تدفع اللثمن.” هلل ستكون قادرة عللى اللانتقام من دوق أغنييس واللعثور عللى أسرة مؤقتة للحماييتها حتى بللوغها سن اللرشد؟

---

description.en:
Adopted from a poor, rural orphanage by a wealthy duke, Naviah Agnus wanted nothing but to win her new father’s heart. Despite her best efforts, the calculating Duke only sees Naviah as a pawn, a mere stand-in for his terminally ill daughter Vivian, who was set to marry the crown prince. But when Vivian miraculously recovers, Naviah is pushed aside and driven to her own death. When she wakes up, she is eight-years old again, but this time, Naviah is done playing nice. Can they ever really become family?

---
"Navia Agnes," adopted to marry the Crown Prince on behalf of Duke Agnes's daughter with a time limit. 

“I really want to be family.”

Navia, who held on to her family’s affection, did her best to become an Empress even while being abused. However, once Vivian, the Duke’s real daughter, is cured, she is abandoned by her family. No, it would be right to say that she was abandoned on all occasions.

“Just how much more effort do I have to make? If I want to be your family,” Navia took off her blood-soaked gloves. 

Then on her right wrist, a number that couldn’t be seen by others appeared. 

"1" 

She calmly admitted, looking down on the number, “I’m going to stop playing with my family now.”

At that moment, the number on her wrist changed. 

"0" 

Just like that, her life began again. 

“If you messed with me, you’re gonna pay for it.”

Will she be able to find a temporary family who will protect her until she becomes of age, and get revenge on Duke Agnes?

---

description.fr:
Huit vies misérables, à se couper en quatre pour satisfaire la moindre des exigences de sa famille d'adoption. Huit morts tragiques, trahie par cette même famille factice. Cette fois, c'en est trop! Naviah a fini de jouer la poupée sage et docile, c'est l'heure de la vengeance! Mais prudence, la maison Agnis pourrait bien ne pas être la plus grande menace dans cette neuvième vie... Quelle peut bien être cette présence malveillante qui semble l'observer depuis un sombre recoin de l'espace-temps...?

---
Navia Agnès est une orpheline adoptée pour épouser le prince héritier et remplacer la fille malade du duc d'Agnès.

«Je voulais juste une vraie famille.»

Navia fait son possible pour obtenir l'affection de sa famille et devenir une bonne impératrice tout en étant maltraitée, mais au moment où Vivian, la fille biologique du duc, est guérie, sa famille adoptive l'abandonne. Et pas qu'une fois, il serait juste de dire que cela est devenu une habitude.

«Combien de fois dois-je encore essayer? Comment avoir enfin une vraie famille?»

Navia enlève ses gants imbibés de sang et sur son poignet droit, un numéro visible par elle seule est révélé.

«Un.»

Regardant le chiffre, elle se calme et décide d'arrêter les jeux de familles. Au moment de sa décision, le numéro sur son poignet change.

«ZÉRO.»

C'est le début d'une nouvelle vie, le commencement pour trouver une nouvelle famille et le départ d'une vengeance.

---

description.id:
Aku sudah berusaha. Berusaha untuk diterima di keluarga ini, dianggap sebagai anak dan adik, menjadi agnus yang sesungguhnya. namun bahkan setelah berkali-kali kembali hidup, aku selalu berakhir mati mengenaskan. Namun suatu hari aku kembali terbangun. aku seharusnya sudah mati... tapi kenapa aku kembali menjadi kecil lagi? Apa ini kesempatan tambahan untuk menjadi anggota keluarga agnus? Atau justru balas dendam karena aku sudah muak?

description.ko:
아그니스 공작의 시한부 딸을 대신하여
황태자와 결혼하기 위해 입양된, '나비아 아그니스'

"진짜 가족이 되고 싶어요."

가족의 애정에 목을 맸던 나비아는
학대를 받으면서도 황후가 되기 위해 최선을 다하지만,
공작의 친딸인 비비안의 병이 낫는 순간, 가족들에게 버려진다.

아니, 그 때마다 버려졌다는 것이 맞을 것이다.

"대체 얼마나 더 노력해야 하는 걸까요? 당신들의 가족이 되려면."

나비아는 피에 젖은 장갑을 벗었다.
그러자 오른 손목에 남들에게는 보이지 않는 숫자가 드러났다.

1

그녀는 숫자를 내려다보며 담담히 고백했다.

"이제 가족 놀이는 그만하려고요."

그 순간, 손목의 숫자가 바뀌었다.

0

그렇게 다시 시작된 삶.

"나를 건드렸다면, 대가는 치러야지."

과연 그녀는 아그니스 공작가에 복수하고,
성인이 될 때까지 자신을 보호해줄 임시 가족을 찾을 수 있을 것인가.

---

description.pt:
Navia Agnes foi adotada para se casar com o príncipe herdeiro em nome da filha do duque Agnes, como uma forma de ganharem tempo. “Eu realmente quero ter uma família.” Navia, que se apegou ao afeto de sua família, fez o possível para se tornar uma imperatriz, mesmo sendo abusada. No entanto, uma vez que Vivian, a verdadeira filha do duque, é curada, ela é abandonada por sua família. Não, seria correto dizer que ela foi abandonada em todas as ocasiões. “Quanto mais esforço tenho que fazer? Se eu quiser fazer parte dessa família? ” Navia tirou as luvas encharcadas de sangue. Então, em seu pulso direito, um número que não podia ser visto por outras pessoas apareceu. Ela admitiu calmamente, olhando para o número: “Desta vez, vou parar de brincar de família com vocês.” Naquele momento, o número em seu pulso mudou. Só assim, sua vida começou de novo. "Se você mexer comigo, irá pagar por isso." Ela será capaz de encontrar uma família temporária que a protegerá até que atinja a maioridade para se vingar do duque Agnes?

---

description.ru:
Нивия — приёмный ребёнок семьи Агнес. Её удочерили ради помолвки с наследным принцем, ведь настоящая дочь рода Агнес неизлечимо больна. Нивия посвятила всю себя этим людям, однако с выздоровлением дочери герцога Вивиан, в ней больше не нуждались.
«Я же просто хотела жить всем вместе как семья. Сколько нужно было ещё усилий?» — подумала умирающая Нивия.
«Я ненавидел тебя с самого начала», — с презрением в глазах произнёс её брат.
Все восемь жизней она хотела быть настоящей Агнес, но, видимо, стоило «перестать играть в семью». Осталась последняя попытка стать счастливой, однако уже не в этом доме.
«Почему я была одержима этой семейкой?»
Сможет ли наша героиня отомстить герцогству Агнес? А главное, найдёт ли она новую и любящую семью?

Ailesin'in sevgisine sarılan Navia, hırpalanırken bile bir imparatoriçe olmak için elinden geleni yaptı. Ancak, Dük'ün gerçek kızı Vivian iyileştiğinde ailesi tarafından terk edildi.

description.vi:
“Navia Agnis” được nhận nuôi để kết hôn với Thái tử thay cho con gái mắc bệnh nan y của công tước Agnis.
“Thật sự tôi muốn chúng ta trở thành gia đình.”
Navia bị trói buộc vào tình cảm gia đình, cô vừa chịu ngược đãi vừa cố gắng hết sức để trở thành hoàng hậu nhưng ngay khi bệnh tình của Vivian được chữa khỏi, những người thân gia đình đó đã vứt bỏ cô.
Không, việc cô bị vứt bỏ khi đó cũng là điều đúng thôi.
“Rốt cuộc thì tôi phải nỗ lực đến mức nào nữa chứ? để có thể trở thành người nhà của các người.”
Navia tháo găng tay đẫm máu ra. lúc đó trên cổ tay phải của cô đã xuất hiện con số mà trước giờ cô vẫn giấu không để người khác nhìn thấy.
1
Cô ấy nhìn con số và chầm chầm nói.
“Từ giờ hãy chấm dứt trò chơi gia đình này đi.”
Khoảnh khắc đó, con số trên cổ tay đã thay đổi.
0
Và thế là cô bắt đầu lại một cuộc sống mới.

description.zh-hk:
代替阿格尼斯公爵的絕症女兒 為了和皇太子結婚而被領養的“納維亞·阿格尼斯”

“我想成為真正的家人” 為了家人的愛而絞盡腦汁的納維亞 雖然受到了虐待，為成為皇后盡了最大的努力， 但公爵的親生女兒薇薇安病好的瞬間，就被家人拋棄了。

不，每當這時就會被拋棄。 “我到底還要付出多少努力？想要成為你們的家人的話。” 納維亞脫掉了沾滿鮮血的手套。

右手手腕上露出了別人看不見的數字。 1 她低頭看著數字，平靜地說。 “我現在不想再玩家人遊戲了。”

那一瞬間，手腕上的數字變了。 0 就這樣重新開始的人生。

“惹了我，就得付出代價。” 究竟，她能否報復阿格尼斯公爵， 找到能保護她到成人的臨時家人。

altTitles.ja: アラバスターの季節

description.en: Maeda Gin is a student who enjoys drawing graffitis at an abandoned apartment complex building near his school, with his friends and acolytes, Teppei and Kon-chan. One night, while they're at work on one of their masterpieces, they're interrupted by a mysterious ghastly pale-skinned woman who scares them. In the process of fleeing, Gin loses his sketchbook to her and then from this point onwards, his life will change in a major way! Some nude painting with his beautiful and attractive art teacher? Welcome to Season of Alabaster.
description.pt-br: Maeda Gin é um estudante que gosta de desenhar graffitis em um prédio abandonado perto de sua escola, com seus amigos e acólitos, Teppei e Kon-chan. Uma noite, enquanto eles estão trabalhando em uma de suas obras-primas, eles são interrompidos por uma misteriosa mulher de pele pálida que os assusta. No processo de fuga, Gin perde seu caderno de desenho para ela e, a partir deste ponto, sua vida muda radicalmente! Alguma pintura nua com sua bela e atraente professora de arte? Bem-vindo à Temporada de Alabastro.

description.en:
'Lovers in peril amongst troubled times, and a grand wheel of fate that awaits them'

You told me, my little Princess,

That a sworn promise must be carved into the heart, not a rock.

"Swear it in front of the Gods of Heaven and Earth, that Eunri and Gyeol are now wed. Carve our names onto here."

The young obedient groom, Se Gyeol, took out a pocket knife and carved their names side by side like the little bride had asked.

"As our names have been carved into this rock, it has now become an oath set in stone."

"Hmph. A sworn promise should be carved into the heart, not a rock, you know."

The Crown Prince of Sayuta, Lee Hun Se Geyol, 13 years old

The Crown Princess of the Je Empire, Dam Eunri, 8 years old

A sworn promise made at youth blossoms entrancingly amidst an impure world stained with betrayals and conspiracies.

난세(亂世)의 위태로운 연인들, 그들 앞에 기다리는 거대한 운명의 수레바퀴

내 어린 비(妃)여
맹세는 돌에 새기는 것이 아니라 마음에 새기는 것이라 했지.

“천지신명에게 약속해. 은리와 결이 오라버니가 혼인하였다고. 여기다 오라버니랑 은리 이름을 새겨.”
말 잘 듣는 꼬마신랑 세결은 주머니칼을 꺼내, 꼬마 신부 은리가 시키는 대로 둘의 이름을 나란히 새겨놓았다.
“칼로 돌에 우리 이름을 새겼으니, 금석지약이다.”
“쳇, 약조는 돌에다 새기는 게 아니지. 마음에 새기는 거랬다, 뭐.”

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

"The deadline is six months, within which you must kill your husband."

On the first night of their marriage, I possessed the body of 'Alice,' a villainous supporting character who was ordered by her mother-in-law to kill her husband.

I thought I was married off to a duke who's a living  corpse for the sake of money, but lo and behold, this duke has a great body and is handsome as well. Instead of killing him, I looked for a way to survive by using divine power instead of poison.

"Mother, I will become a priestess for the duke!
As a priestess, I shall pray for the duke's well-being for the rest of my life!"

On the day I was about to leave the duke's mansion, my husband who had been unconscious suddenly woke up.

"You're the one who brought me out of the darkness, so take responsibility."

He wakes up and demands I take responsibility after saving him?

title.en: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者になれなかった俺、スキル「おっぱい矯正」で悩めるあの子を人助け!?

altTitles.en: I Couldn’t Become an Adventurer, so I’ll Help Troubled Girls With My [Breast Correction] Skill!?

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... "breast correction"!?

Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it.

---

Web Novel Raw Link - [https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277)
description.ja:
地球上に突如としてダンジョンが現れてから十余年。優れたスキルを持つ者が冒険者として活躍する世界で、高校生・宮本武が開眼したスキルは……「おっぱい矯正」!? 見たことも聞いたこともない異色のスキルに戸惑う武だったが、それを必要とする女の子は意外にも多そうでーー。

* **宮本 武（みやもと たける）**
高校1年生。密かに冒険者への憧れていたものの、「おっぱい矯正士」という謎のジョブを得てしまう。

* **平良璃夢(たいらりむ)**
武のクラスメイト。武がジョブ「おっぱい矯正士」であることに気づき、あるお願いをする。
 
--- 
 
Chikyū-jō ni totsujotoshite danjon ga arawarete kara jūyonen. Sugureta sukiru o motsu mono ga bōken-sha to shite katsuyaku suru sekai de, kōkōsei miyamoto takeshi ga kaigan shita sukiru wa... "oppai kyōsei"!? Mita koto mo kiita koto mo nai ishoku no sukiru ni tomadou budattaga, sore o hitsuyō to suru on'nanoko wa igainimo ō-sōde ̄̄. 

* **Miyamoto Takeshi**
Kōkō 1-nensei. Hisoka ni bōken-sha e no akogarete ita mono no, "oppai kyōsei-shi" to iu nazo no jobu o ete shimau. 

* **Taira Aki yume**
Take no kurasumeito. Bu ga jobu "oppai kyōsei-shi" dearu koto ni kidzuki, aru onegai o suru.

description.en: Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.

description.en:
She possessed a villainess who is known and hated for her evil acts in an unpopular novel. But because of her personality, it was extremely difficult for her to play the villainess role. But not for long…

“I’ll fix your dress according to your taste this instant!”

“My request.”

“O-Of course! As per your request, there’s only one piece available in the whole Empire.”

People around me listen to me well even if I just frown and sit still. Since I don’t have to live in difficulty, I decided to just comfortably live on as a villainess.

“Father. Is it necessary for you to solve formulas in this slow and inefficient way?”

I thought it would be good to be a rich villainess, so I used all my knowledge.

“Why don’t you give me the honor of escorting the Princess?”

I have had enough of dealing with my father, so why did an unexpected character suddenly appear? What if this person disrupts my plan?

---
Dohee lived as a pushover, died miserably, and was reborn in a novel as a notorious villainess. But it turns out that her new life is not without its perks, as Deborah Seymour is also the richest villain alive. Now, all that's left for her to do is lay low and enjoy her carefree lifestyle...if not for the fact that Deborah is fated to be sent to a monastery! Will this ex-doormat find a way to avoid yet another tragic ending, or will the challenges of being a villainess be too much for her?

---

description.fr:
Dohee a vécu comme une poule mouillée, a péri misérablement et a été réincarnée dans un roman en tant que vilaine notoire. Mais il s'avère que sa nouvelle vie n'est pas sans avantages, car Deborah Seymour est aussi la méchante la plus riche de l'Empire. Il ne lui reste plus qu'à faire profil bas et à profiter de son insouciance... Si ce n'est que Deborah est condamnée à être envoyée dans un monastère! Cette ancienne fainéante trouvera-t-elle un moyen d'éviter une nouvelle fin tragique, ou les défis d'une méchante seront-ils trop importants pour elle?

description.hr:
Yoon Dohee, studentica arhitektonskog fakulteta, otkriva da ju njezine kolege i obitelj iskorištavaju za novac i kao besplatnu radnu snagu točno prije nego pogine u prometnoj nesreći.
Umjesto da zapravo umre ona se reinkarnira u ljubavni roman koji je nedavno čitala, ali ne kao glavni lik, nego kao glavni zlikovac i antagonist knjige Deborah Seymour.
Sada kao Deborah ona navigira novi život odmarajući se u bogatstu i raskoši, ali mora biti na oprezu jer je njezina reputacija duboko pod zemljom, a lik Debore u originalnoj knjizi završava svoju priču u tamnici.
description.id:
Kehidupan Yoon Dohee, wanita naif yang kerap dimanfaatkan oleh orang sekitarnya berubah drastis. Setelah dia mengalami kecelakaan dan sekarat, dia merasuk ke dalam tubuh wanita jahat bernama Deborah Seymour. Deborah Seymour adalah seorang tokoh di novel reverse harem rating 19+ berjudul 'A Dark Thorn Through My Throat'. Karena tidak ingin ada orang lain yang tahu kalau sebenarnya Yoon Dohee adalah wanita naif, dia akhirnya belajar untuk menjadi jahat seperti Deborah Seymour. "Aku tidak akan hidup sebagai orang yang baik dan menyedihkan seperti di masa lalu. Aku akan terus hidup enak sebagai wanita jahat!"

description.uk:
Ду Хі опанувала тіло лиходійки одного непопулярного роману, яка була відома і ненависна всім за свої погані вчинки. Але через власний характер їй дуже важко правильно грати роль злодійки. Але ненадовго.. 

"Я зміню сукню згідно з вашим смаком негайно" 

"Моє прохання." 

"З-звісно! Згідно з вашим запитом, у всій імперії є лише одна річ." 

Люди навколо мене добре слухають, навіть якщо я просто хмурюсь і сиджу на місці. Оскільки мені не доводиться жити в труднощах, я вирішила просто комфортно жити у тілі лиходійки. 

«Батько, чи потрібно вам розв’язувати формули таким повільним і неефективним способом?» 

Я подумала, що було б добре бути багатою негідницею, тому використовувала усі свої знання. 

«Чому б вам не надати мені честь супроводжувати принцесу?» 

У мене досить багато справ з батьком, так чому раптом з’явився цей неочікуваний персонаж? Що, якщо ця людина спробує порушити мій план?

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: Baby Dragon Tames the Crazy Guys

altTitles.en: The Baby Dragon Tames The Crazy People

description.en:
The Emperor of the Empire of Atlantis, Thalassa, in the depths of the sea. Contrary to her belief that days of abundance and happiness would continue,
she was betrayed by her lover and friend, and sealed away for a thousand years.

And when she opened her eyes again...

"I, who was once the great Emperor of the glorious empire, have become a baby as small as a baby crab!"

Atlantis had already perished, and Thalassa was reborn as the baby princess and dragon heiress of the kingdom established by the traitors!

What's more? The dragon heiress has to marry the crown prince to break the curse?

"You scoundrels!"

Not only did she have to uncover the secrets of Atlantis's demise,
but she found herself destined to marry the crown prince against her will.

"I have no choice. I'll just stay with them until the curse on the crown prince is lifted!"
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia zostaje zdradzona i zapieczętowana przez swojego kochanka i przyjaciółkę, których kochała.
I od tego czasu minęło tysiąc lat.
Tarassa, nie, zostałam reinkarnowana jako księżniczka Nisseph w kraju, który stworzyli!
'Czy to ma sens?!'
Byłam cesarzem wielkiego imperium!
Ale stałam się dzieckiem tak małym jak krabik!
'Uh-huh, ciało Jima nie ma sensu...'
"Księżniczka stanie się Księciem Smoczej Korony, który zakończy wszystkie te klątwy zgodnie z wyrocznią".
Jednak aby złamać klątwę przekazywaną od tysiąca lat, musi być związana z Księciem Korony.
'To jest ofiara z człowieka. To jak ukwiecenie, ale...'
"Jeśli ty jesteś morzem, ja stanę się Gwiazdą Północną, która świeci tylko na ciebie".
"...Zion."
"Życie bez ciebie jest nic nie warte".
Współczuję Księciu Korony cierpiącemu z powodu klątwy.
Muszę odkryć tajemnicę dnia, w którym zostałam zapieczętowana...
Posiedźmy tutaj jeszcze chwilę!

description.en:
In Gangshik Choi's world, monster attacks are a common occurrence. Humanity is protected by hunters with superpowers who stream their fights online, and it is Gangshik's job to get it all on camera as the cameraman for a below-average monster streamer. In a stream gone wrong, he suddenly finds himself in front of the camera... but human viewers aren't the only ones watching him. Now, he is a streamer for the Gods, and more viewers mean more power. With monsters at every turn, how long can Gangshik keep the cameras rolling?
(Source: Tapas Media)
description.ko:
'몬스터'라는 존재가 등장하여 인류를 위협하는 사회.

 아무런 예고 없이 등장한 이질적인 존재에 의해  
 주인공 최강식의 가족은 목숨을 잃게 된다.

 가족의 복수를 꿈꾸며 살아가지만, 초능력에 적성이 없는 최강식.  
 그런 그의 눈앞에 뜬 이질적인 문구.
 
 '어떤 신이 인사합니다.' [시청자 1]
 
 그건 바로 신의 여흥을 위한 스트리머로 선정된 것!
 '시청'하는 신들의 숫자가 늘수록 새로운 능력과 아이템을 얻게 된다는 사실. 
 이제 주인공은 목숨을 건 방송을 시작하게 된다. 

 오로지 가족의 복수를 위해서...

description.en:
Yukina was a young man who hailed from the same village as the Yuusha who shouldered the fate of the world. Through a certain incident, he got ahold of the talking spear, Gram. It was a weapon that was on par with the legendary sword the Hero wielded. The first volume of an adventure fantasy of the youth with a realistic growth!

**Note:**
The artist Mao retired at chapter 20 and was replaced by Kuuma Arai at chapter 21.
description.id:
Yukina adalah seorang pria muda yang berasal dari sebuah desa di mana sang pahlawan yang memikul beban dunia juga berasal.  
Karena suatu insiden, dia mendapatkan sebuah tombak yang dapat berbicara bernama Gram. Dan itu adalah senjata yang setara dengan pedang legendaris yang dimiliki oleh sang Pahlawan.  
Kisah fantasi petualangan para pemuda dengan pertumbuhan yang realistis dimulai!

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

altTitles.ja: 潔癖男子！青山くん

description.en: Aoyama is a handsome young soccer genius who's a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
description.pl: Aoyama to przystojny, młody geniusz piłki nożnej, który reprezentuje Japonię. Jego styl gry to "czystość". Nie tackluje i nie główkuje piłki. Jeśli wykonuje wrzutkę, robi to tylko w rękawicach.

description.en:
When a goddess transports Hansoo Kang and his classmates to a magical fantasy world to become heroes, it’s like a dream come true. But when Hansoo declines to risk his life for a world that isn’t his own, the goddess leaves him for dead, alone in the forest.

That’s when he realizes she’s not what she seems. With the help of a loner god, Hansoo faces the hostile new world and earns powerful blessings to help him survive. But his goal isn’t to save the world; it’s to return home… well, after he gets revenge on the goddess, that is.
description.ko:
지금까지 이런 용사는 없었다.
이것은 용사인가 악마인가.

같은 반 아이들과 이세계로 소환된 강한수.
반 친구들은 마법이니 이세계니 신기해 하지만,
한수는 얼른 집에 돌아가고 싶을 뿐이다.
안락하고 따뜻한 우리 집을 냅두고 왜 이세계에서 모험같은 걸...?

소환한 여신도 정 의지가 없다면 어쩔 수 없다며 본래 세계로 돌려보내주겠다고 약속하고
한수를 집으로 보내주지만...

눈을 떠보니 이세계 그대로!
친구들은 없어졌고 주위에는 몬스터 뿐이다!!

여신이 날 속였어...?
집에는 어떻게 돌아가지...??
그보다 여기서는 어떻게 살아남지...???

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EC%9A%A9%EC%82%AC-%EC%8B%A4%ED%99%94%EB%83%90/2821)
description.uk:
Такого героя ще не було!
Він герой, чи справжній демон?

Кан Хансу був призваний у цей світ разом зі своїми однокласниками.
Його однокласники були вражені цим абсолютно новим світом і магією в ньому, але єдине, чого хотів Хансу, — це швидко повернутися додому.

"Навіщо мені відмовлятися від свого теплого, затишного дому, щоб отримати пригоду в цьому світі…?

Навіть богиня, яка викликала мене, сказала, що якщо я не хочу, вона не буде змушувати мене, і пообіцяла повернути мене в мій початковий світ.
Вона телепортувала мене, але…

Коли я відкрив очі, я досі був у цьому світі!
Усі мої друзі зникли, а навколо мене були лише монстри!!

Якась богиня обдурила мене...?
Як мені тепер повернутися додому...?
Більше того, як мені тут вижити...?!"

altTitles.ja: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい

altTitles.es: Esa gal de Hokkaido es demasiado linda

description.en: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
description.es:
Tsubasa es un chico que se va vivir desde Tokyo a Hokkaido en pleno invierno porque han trasladado a su padre. En su antiguo instituto no era nada popular y se metían con él siempre que podían. Dispuesto a empezar una nueva vida, llega en taxi entre un paisaje nevado y se baja a las primeras de cambio pensando que ya ha llegado.

Pero pronto se da cuenta de que en Hokkaido las cosas son diferentes que en la gran ciudad y aquí las distancias son mucho mayores, así que el sitio al que iba está a tres horas andando: eso significa que se ha quedado tirado en medio de la nieve. El impacto es mayor cuando se encuentra con Minami Fuyuki, una chica vestida como la típica gal pese al frío que hace.

Minami no sólo es guapa, sino que es una chica supermaja y con las maneras de una gal, un crush instantáneo para Tsubasa, aunque el combo de gal más chica de pueblo lo deja bastante perplejo y más cuando se entera de que van al mismo instituto. Gracias a Minami podrá integrarse bastante rápido y conocer a otras gals, aunque el choque cultural a varios niveles está servido. ¡Sus días de gals, frío y diversión acaban de empezar!
description.fr:
Natsukawa Tsubasa vient de déménager de Tokyo à Hokkaido, en plein hiver. Ne se rendant pas compte de la réalité des distances à la campagne, il se retrouve perdu à 3 heures de marche de sa destination. Mais il fait également la rencontre d’une Dosanko (« née et élevée à Hokkaido ») gyaru, en minijupe par – 8°C !  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikada_kai) | [Author's YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-U4OJu-cEF2VlnM61B77bQ) | [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21326958)
description.ru:
Нацукава Цубаса только что переехал из Токио на Хоккайдо.  Не имея представления, о том какое большое расстояние между населёнными пунктами в захолустье он решил выйти из такси в соседнем городе, посреди зимы. Однако он был шокирован узнав, что до соседнего города идти целых 3 часа. Тут же он встречает Досанко-гяру (родом из Хоккайдо) по имени Фуюки Минами, которая при минус 8 градусах цельсия ходит в стандартной одежде гяру: короткой юбке и с голыми ногами.  


---
description.tr: Liseli Tsubasa, Hokkaido’daki Kitami şehrine taşınır ve oradaki bir otobüs durağında bir "gyaru" ile tanışır. Dondurucu soğuğa rağmen çıplak bacaklarıyla beyaz kar manzarasının karşısında tek başına durduğunu görmek kalbini cezbeder.
description.pt-br: Shiki Tsubasa acaba de se mudar de Tóquio para Hokkaido no meio do inverno. Sem perceber a distância entre as cidades do país, ele desce do táxi na cidade mais próxima de seu destino para poder ver os pontos turísticos ao redor de sua casa, mas fica chocado quando descobre que a "próxima cidade" é uma a três horas a pé. No entanto, ele também conhece uma linda Dosanko (nascido e criado em Hokkaido) gyaru chamado Fuyuki Minami, que está enfrentando um clima de 8 graus Celsius abaixo de 0 com a roupa gyaru padrão de saias curtas e pernas nuas!

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid is Way Too Annoying!

altTitles.ja: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！
つばくま！

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.

Ever since that fateful rainy day when she was rescued by the handsome Duke Killian Devonshire, Rowena has lived as his mistress. Though she believes that Killian has grown to love her over the past three years, she wants to repay her debt to him and become his equal so that she can stand proudly by his side. But when Killian begins to behave strangely, her trust in him wavers, only for it to be fully broken the day he introduces another woman to be his future wife. Thus, Rowena decides to make some drastic changes to their relationship. But will it be for better or for worse?

title.en: Bouken Ni Wa, Buki Ga Hitsuyou Da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Kurashi~

altTitles.ja: 冒険には、武器が必要だ！～こだわりルディの鍛冶屋ぐらし～

description.en: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
description.ja: 迷宮前町の金物屋で働く見習いの少女・ルディは親方に怒られながらも奇想天外な武器を作って、世界一の鍛冶職人を目指して奮闘中。 迷宮の外側の街で冒険を支える普通の人々の日常を描くクラフト・ファンタジー！

description.en: There hasn't been a queen like this before! The strongest monarch in Babel's history is called the God of War, God's Daughter, Aroha Fenril Astrofortus! After her return from concluding a seven-year war, she finds that those bastard nobles have prepared a bothersome trap… 'Your Majesty, you must choose a husband and continue the royal family's bloodline!' She wants to throw all of that away, but in consideration of the royal bloodline, she does have to get married. On top of that, she's receiving a crazy amount of proposals from those that are vying for Babel's second-highest position. The husband candidates are chosen by the Grand Chamberlain on special orders! The genius that is Babel Academy's youngest professor in all history, an optimistic national guard, Babel’s General and the Queen’s reliable comrade, and the young hero of Babel's political world, the most beautiful man. …Who will Aroha choose?
description.ko:
바벨 역사상 가장 강력한 군주,
전쟁의 신, 신의 딸이라 일컬어지는
아로아 펜릴 아스트로포투스!

7년간의 전쟁을 마치고 왕국을 제국으로 만들
기틀을 닦아놓고 화려하게 귀환했건만,
귀족 놈들이 여왕 여왕 거리면서
감히 건방지고 골치 아픈 올가미를 내놓았다.

‘부군을 선택하여 왕가의 대를 이으소서!’

그 속이 빤해서 다 엎어버리고 싶지만,
후대를 생각하면 결혼을 하긴 해야겠고…

바벨에서 두 번째로 높은 사람이 되기 위한
사내들의 청혼서가 미친 듯이 몰려오는데…!

엄선되고 또 엄선된 남편 후보들이
겉은 그럴듯한데 죄다 뭔가 이상하다?

바벨 아카데미 역사상 최연소 천재 교수 : 
부드럽고 지적인… 고자?

소탈하고 낙천적인 수도 방위군 장교 : 
상큼하고 귀여운데… 약혼녀가 있네?

바벨의 대장군이자 공작가의 후예 : 
든든한 전우이긴 한데… 친구의 애인이잖아?

그리고, 바벨에서 가장 아름다운 정치계의 젊은 영웅 : 
용모와 이력은 화려하지만… 이미 예전에 반품한 놈이다!

…과연, 아로아의 선택은?



[타이포 : 도씨 님(@US_DOCCI)]

On a fervent quest to become stronger —- the heroic tales of the adventurer Lecan start!   
  
The One-Eyed Wolf Lecan jumped into a black hole he found in the confines of a labyrinth, falling into another world. No matter the world he is in, the adventurer Lecan doesn't lose his way. Seeking strength, challenging labyrinths, and defeating formidable foes —- This is the stout fantasy written by Shien BIS (Henkyou no Roukishi), combined with the passionate art of Shinkawa Gonbe (Yokohama-eki SF).

Зайдя в кампус он замечает темноволосую девушку и подходит к ней с пачкой сигарет, желая привлечь её внимание. Несмотря на то, что Кохай терпит неудачу, он собирается идти до конца и добиться её сердца.

description.de:
Juvelian ist eine Schurkin, die so sehr von allen verabscheut wird, dass selbst ihr Liebhaber und ihr Vater sie einen grausamen Tod sterben lassen. Gerade als sie sich ihrem Schicksal stellen will, erhält sie die Chance, den Verlauf ihrer Geschichte zu ändern. Um ihr tragisches Ende abzuwenden, beendet sie die Beziehung mit ihrem Liebhaber und hört auf zu versuchen, die Zuneigung ihres Vaters zu gewinnen. Stattdessen konzentriert sie sich darauf, seinen Reichtum zu nutzen, um ihr neues Leben in vollen Zügen zu genießen! Aber während sie sich auf ihr extravagantes Leben als Lady vorbereitet, beginnt ihr Vater nach einem geeigneten Ehemann für sie zu suchen. Aus Angst, dass er sie an den berüchtigt launischen Prinzen verheiraten wird, kommt sie zu einer verzweifelten Lösung: ein Dating-Vertrag. Und der beste Kandidat dafür ist kein anderer als der Schüler ihres Vaters.

---

description.en:
I’m Juvelian? The daughter of the duke and the villainess of this novel? I managed to avoid my death with some previous knowledge about my life, as this was my second time at it. Now, I should be able to live a peaceful life!

“I’m not going to marry a man unless he has everything. I want the most wealthy, famous, and competent man there is.”

I dreamt of a glamorous life as the daughter of the duke, but my father tells me the Crown Prince who is known to be a lunatic is to be my husband! As an extraordinary measure, I couldn’t help but start a contract relationship. That is, with a handsome side character that looks better than the main one.

“Why are you trying to avoid being engaged to the prince?”

“He’s scary. I heard that he even kills his own entourage if he doesn’t like them.”

A few days later, the prince sent a terrible letter to me.

“I will not kill you.”

Oh no, did I set up another death trap for myself?

---
Juvelian is a villainess so hated by everyone that even her lover and father leave her to die a pitiful death. Just as she's about to face her fate, she gets the chance to change the course of her story. In order to avoid the tragic end she knows awaits her, she breaks up with her lover and gives up trying to win her father's love. Instead, she focuses on using his wealth to enjoy her new life to its fullest! But while she prepares for her extravagant life as a lady, her father begins looking for her new suitor. Afraid that he'll marry her off to the infamously unpredictable and stormy prince, she lands on a desperate solution: a dating contract. And the best candidate is none other than her father's student.

---

description.fr:
Juvelian est une personne si méchante que tout le monde la déteste, à tel point que même l'homme qu'elle aime et son propre père l'abandonnent à une mort pathétique. Alors qu'elle est sur le point de rendre l'âme, elle reçoit une opportunité de changer son destin. Afin d'éviter la fin tragique qui l'attend, elle rompt avec son petit copain et arrête d'essayer de gagner l'amour de son père. Elle décide plutôt de se servir de sa richesse pour profiter de sa vie au maximum ! Mais alors qu'elle se prépare à mener la vie fastueuse qu'elle a choisi de mener, son père se lance à la recherche d'un homme auquel la marier. Par peur de finir mariée à l'imprévisible prince au caractère houleux, elle prend une décision désespérée: une romance sur contrat. Et le meilleur candidat n'est autre que le disciple de son père...

---
Je me suis réincarnée dans le roman que je lisais en tant que la méchante Juvelian Eloy Floyen. J’étais destinée à mourir… Mais avec les souvenirs de mon ancienne vie, j’ai pu empêcher ma mort!

«J’épouserai un homme qui a de l’honneur, de bonne famille et qui a du pouvoir.»

Alors que je déclarais ma volonté de vivre une vie glorieuse et glamour, mon père a décidé de faire du prince héritier mon fiancé?! Est-il fou?!

«Pourquoi évitez-vous votre engagement avec le prince héritier?»

«Parce que ça me fait peur! Il tue les gens qui ne lui obéissent pas!»

Quelques jours plus tard, le prince héritier m'a envoyé une lettre.

«Ne t'inquiète pas, je ne te tuerai pas.»

Oh non… ai-je déjà fait quelque chose qui valait la peine de mourir?

---

description.hu:
Jubelian vagyok? A herceg lánya és ennek a regénynek a gazembere? Sikerült elkerülnöm a halálomat néhány korábbi tudással az életemről, mivel ez már a második alkalom. Képesnek kell lennem arra, hogy békés életet éljek! "Nem fogok hozzámenni egy férfihoz sem, hacsak nincs meg mindene. A leggazdagabb, leghíresebb és legkompetensebb embert akarom." Elbűvölő életről álmodtam, mint a herceg lánya, de az apám azt mondja, hogy a koronaherceg, aki arról ismert, hogy őrült, legyen a férjem! Rendkívüli intézkedésként nem tudtam mást tenni, mint egy szerződéses viszonyt elindítani. Vagyis egy jóképű mellékszereplővel, aki jobban néz ki, mint a főszereplő. – Miért próbálja elkerülni, hogy eljegyezze magát a koronaherceggel? „Ijesztő. Azt hallottam, hogy még a saját kíséretét is megöli, ha nem szereti őket.”

---

description.ru:
Я переродилась как Джубэлиан Элой Флойен – злодейка прочитанной мной новеллы. Я была обречена на смерть, но не тут-то было! Используя воспоминания о прошлой жизни, я собираюсь избежать своей гибели!

«Я не выйду замуж за мужчину без чести, семьи, имущества и силы!»

Как только я заявила о своём желании жить великолепной и роскошной жизнью, мой отец решил сделать меня невестой кронпринца! Он сумасшедший?! Ведь я буду рассматривать помолвку только в качестве крайней меры.

«Почему ты избегаешь помолвки с наследным принцем?»

«Он меня пугает! Он сразу же убивает тех, кто ослушался его!»

Через несколько дней наследный принц отправил письмо.
«Не переживай, тебя я не убью».

О, нет… неужели я уже что-то натворила? Что-то, за что должна умереть?

---

description.uk:
Я переродилася в лиходійку новели, яку я читала, Джувеліан Елой Флоен. Я приречена на смерть, але ні! Зі спогадами про моє минуле життя я уникну "прапорця смерті"!
-Я не одружуся на чаловікові, який не має ні честі, ні походження, ні власності, ні влади!
Лишень я вимовила бажання прожити своє життя щасливо, мій батько вирішив зробити кронпринца моїм нареченим! Та він божевільний! Я розглядатиму ці заручини лише якщо не буде вибору.
-Чому ти уникаєш заручин із кронпринцем?
-Бо він лякає мене! Він вбиває на місці всіх, хто не скорився йому!
Кілька днів потому кронпринц надіслав мені листа:"Не переймайся, я не вб'ю тебе."
Дідько, невже я заслуговую на таку смерть?

---

description.zh:
恶毒反派“贝莉安”第一世被男友诬陷，被爸爸抛弃，在监狱中悲惨的死去。附身于“贝莉安”身上的我决定这一世不与任何人有瓜葛：与男友分手，放弃奢求爸爸的爱，一心过悠闲华丽的的名媛生活…什么？爸爸让我和暴君皇太子结婚？为了逃避结婚，我只能和爸爸的学生假装恋爱！

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

altTitles.ja: 大怪獣ゲァーチマ

description.en:
The port town of Sukuba was hit by a huge wave caused by a monster that suddenly appeared from the sea. The inactive monster dissolved into the sea and became a rich source of nutrients for fish and shellfish. As a result, Sukuba's economy thrived. The monster started to be called Gaea-Tima, the god of the harvest.

A young girl, Miyako Morino, a victim of the disaster, made a doll of Gaea-Tima, as a memento of the event, which was sold as a souvenir and became a popular item. However, for the first time in 10 years, a monster appears in the reconstructed town of Sukuba...

Is this monster a friend or foe of mankind?
description.ja: 海から突如出現した怪獣と共に起きた大波で、港町・匡波町は被災した。活動を停止した怪獣は、海に溶け魚介類の豊かな栄養素となり、匡波町の経済を潤し、豊穣の神ゲァーチマと呼ばれるようになった。被災者である少女・杜野宮矢子がその出来事を形に遺すべく作ったゲァーチマの人形は、土産物として販売され人気を集めていた。しかし、復興した匡波町に10年ぶりに怪獣が現れ…。怪獣は人類の敵か味方か？

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム サンダーボルト

description.en: Into this maelstrom of destruction go two veteran Mobile Suit pilots: the deadly Zeon sniper Daryl Lorenz, and Federation ace Io Fleming. It’s the beginning of a rivalry that can end only when one of them is destroyed. The lightning-streaked debris fields are about to become the stage for an epic duel where death is the only true winner. [Viz]

altTitles.ja: Kimi to sugosu happiibaasudee

description.en:
It's not easy being rich.

After suddenly becoming an orphan, Isnelda is sent to live with her cold relatives until she reaches adulthood and can gain her inheritance. Yet upon becoming an adult, a benefactor returns to Isnelda's life, opening her eyes to a world of wealth, greed, lust, and... magic? What could go wrong?
description.fr: Isnelda a tout perdu le jour de ses 11 ans. Orpheline et déshéritée, elle doit vivre chez son oncle qui la méprise et supporter ses cousins et cousines qui chacun la maltraitent à sa manière. Son seul espoir, Noah Argente, I'homme qui lui a tout pris à la mort de ses parents. Mais était-ce vraiment le cas ? Cet homme si charmant et mystérieux n'est-il pas en réalité le sauveur qu'elle a toujours attendu ? Et qui d'entre Noah et Edvan sera celui qui éveillera son cœur?
description.ko:
12살 생일 모든 것을 잃은 소녀 이스닐다.
부모님의 죽음과 잃어버린 재산. 하나뿐인 친척들은 양육비만을 목적으로
이스닐다를 구속하고 괴롭힌다.
지옥 같은 이 집에서 나가는 날만 기다리던 그녀에게 기적적으로 나타난 구원자.
그런데 그 구원자가 알고 보니 그녀를 나락으로 빠트린 주인공?

천덕꾸러기 고아 소녀에서 하루아침에 거액의 상속녀가 되고, 마법사의 능력까지
각성한 이스닐다.
앞으로는 꽃길만 펼

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?
